" Clarence Mitchell joins the Tory comms operation today, reporting directly to director of communications Andy Coulson . Clarence Mitchell , who was the director of the Government's media monitoring unit for two years( 2005-2007) will take a back room role, monitoring the progress of the Tories' campaign in the media. Wedbush Morgan analyst Lou Kerner says, Facebook is the most ominous threat to Google Inc. , but Facebook is just emblematic of the rising pace at which all of these( startups) are moving. It's Facebook today, it's Groupon tomorrow, and it will be someone else after that. Google Inc. still hasn't been able to develop an effective social networking tool to counter Facebook, a delay that could cost the company dearly as Facebook learns more about people's ages, hometowns and passions.

The third annual CNN Heroes were chosen by a panel that included distinguished leaders and humanitarians like Colin Powell , Whoopi Goldberg , Ted Turner , and Elton John .
